column4: I went from an ubuntu 10.04 install to mythbuntu via package manager..is there a way i can go to ubuntu 10.10 or even back to 10.04 without a fresh install?
I went from an ubuntu 10.04 install to mythbuntu via package manager..is there a way i can go to ubuntu 10.10 or even back to 10.04 without a fresh install?
install ubuntu-desktop via via the Mythbuntu Control Centre.
